name: High Protein Cottage Cheese Cookie Dough
description: Cottage cheese is going viral as the magic ingredient to make edible cookie dough. It’s a nutrition powerhouse full of calcium and protein. Add a scoop of protein powder – Power Up Vanilla, Salted Caramel, or Chocolate are all great choices– and you’ve got a dessert that’s delicious, satisfying, and won’t give you a sugar crash. Try different mix-ins for a fun, customizable treat everyone can enjoy.

ingredients.name: Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend, Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend, or Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend

preparation:
1. In a food processor or high-speed blender, blend cottage cheese until smooth. Scrape Into a large bowl. Add flour, protein blend, and sweet dip mix. Stir to combine.  
  2. If desired, fold in chocolate chips. Enjoy!
tips:
No food processor? No problem! Simply stir the ingredients very well––you’re looking for a smooth texture, similar to cookie dough. 

For a calorie conscious dessert, look for a lower % milk fat cottage cheese or enjoy 1⁄4 cup serving. 

Make it your way! Check out these mix-in suggestions for inspiration: 

Power Up Chocolate Protein Powder Blend: peanut butter chips, chopped nuts, Chocolate Bliss Brownie chunks. 

Power Up Vanilla Protein Powder Blend: fresh berries, Dulce de Leche Pudding or Luscious Lemon Curd, dried cranberries. 

Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Powder Blend: white chocolate chips, chopped dates, crushed pretzels.
